Mero sanu sathi is the educational concept for building Free and Open Source tools (Software/Contents). This concept aims to the children of
Nepal . Currently mero Sanu Sathi contains the following learning methods for children.
Barnamala: Alphabet learning tool.
Dunot: Mathematics learning Tool.
Katha: Learning Interactive stories.
Chitrapati: Logolike IDE for drawing pictures and different geometric shapes.
Geet: Listening to nursery rhymes.
Khel: Small interactive and educational games collection.

Future Plan
Mero sanu sathi has a short term plan of releasing it on the schools with computer facility at first. later on it has a plan to embed itself in the OLPC XO machine.
